package.name: csl_robots_gazebo
package.description:
The csl_robots_gazebo package
Gazebo-related files for running simulations of single- and multi-robot graphSLAM.
models/ Directory contains models to be imported in worlds utilised in graphSLAM simulations worlds/ Directory containing Gazebo worlds for simulations. config/ Directory contains configuration files, mostly for bash, to setup necessary actiosn and variables for running a graphSLAM simulation nodes/ Python scripts for automating the creation and management of running *multiple* instances of tasks associated with graphSLAM.
See the corresponding subfolders (as well as file docstrings) for more details on the underlying files.
